content: पर्यंत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Bounded by, extending as far as; सपुदपर्यंता पृथ्वी ‘the oceanbounded earth’. --तः {@--1@} Circuit. circumference. {@--2@} Skirt, edge, border. extremity, boundary; उटजपर्यंतचारिणी <ls>Ś. 4</ls>: पर्यतवनं <ls>R. 13. 38</ls>; <ls>Rs. 3. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Side, flank; <ls>Ratn. 2. 3</ls>: <ls>R. 18. 43.</ls> {@--4@} End, conclusion, termination; <ls>Pt. 1. 125.</ls>
